short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScanScout - Advanced 3-in-1 Sourcing Extension and Analytics Software For Amazon Resellers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ScanScout is your key to becoming a TOP seller on Amazon.com!
Created by sellers for sellers, ScanScout gives you the necessary edge to get ahead of the competition, and stay ahead!

✅ 50 indicators to get a 100% overview of any product
✅ Instantly determine potential profits and analyze margins with the integrated FBA Calculator.
✅ Know whether it’s the right time to sell with the support of the historical data, tools, and the Stock Checker.
✅ See if an item is “Restricted” or “HazMAt”, or if Amazon itself is a seller.
✅ Manage listings you like and add them to your Seller Panel.

!!! Start with the FREE plan for the Extension : 48 of the 50 functions available! !!!
Limited only by 100 ASINs/day No payment information required. 

⭐⭐⭐  FEATURES ⭐⭐⭐

⭐ FBA REVENUE CALCULATOR ⭐
No more spending countless hours estimating approximate revenue. ScanScout’s state-of-the-art software shows you exact profit, margin, ROI based not only off of current data directly from Amazon, but also off of packing fees, shipping fees, and more! 

⭐ CATEGORY INDICATORS ⭐
Not sure if you can sell a specific item? Want to know if Amazon is also selling a particular product? Perhaps you’re unsure of whether or not an item is considered “HazMat”. 

Now, thanks to ScanScout’s extension indicators, all of this information, and more, is instantly accessible to you in a matter of seconds! Simply open up a listing in Amazon and know right away how this product is categorized. 

⭐ SELLER DATA ⭐
ScanScout’s Chrome browser extension gives you everything you need to estimate the competition on a listing. 
See how many sellers are moving a specific product, as well as how often they have it in stock. You can even see how often Amazon itself is actually offering this item! 
Now you can adjust your seller strategy for maximum results!

⭐ STOCK CHECKER ⭐
With all of your data perfectly streamlined, you can check to verify which of your competitor has a particular product in stock and it’s quantity. 

You can also see which supplier has the best price for that item and other alternative supplier options. No more ordering in bulk, only to find out that you could have saved hundreds, or even thousands, just by going with a different supplier. 
ScanScout ensures that you’re always in the know!

⭐ HISTORICAL DATA ⭐
Not only does ScanScout show you an item’s ranking in Amazon, but also its performance over time. Track an item’s activity over a span of 30 days up to 1 full year!

Your extension even shows you the estimated average sales per month. 
With easily adjustable charts and readily accessible figures, you can now rest easy knowing that you’ll always be making the most informed decisions!

⭐ QUICK-SAVE ⭐
Found an item you’d like to sell later? Instantly add an item to any one of your lists from ScanScout Seller Panel with the simple click of a button.
With on-demand refreshable data, you can now select items, save them, and verify their potential profitability whenever you want, as often as you want. 

⭐ INSTANT RESULTS ⭐
ScanScout’s advanced software is hosted in Amazon’s lightning-fast AWS servers, meaning you get the information you need as soon as you need it! 
Upload your supplier catalogs to your account and let ScanScout do all the heavy lifting for you. With thousands of results loaded in only a few minutes, you can spend less time waiting and analyzing, and more time selling! 


See how ScanScout could take your Amazon business to the next level! 

⭐ START YOUR FREE 14-DAY TRIAL NOW! ⭐ 
No credit card required. After your free trial, select which plan fits you best, with options starting as low as $4.99 per month.
